data.actual_result: The sensitivity slider appears with both sides orange
data.expected_result: The sensitivity slider appears with an orange portion on the left and green on the right
data.short_description: Toggling auto-sensitivity after changing voice sensitivity turns the slider orange
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to User Settings - Access Voice settings - Ensure input mode is Voice Activity and Auto Sensitivity is off - Move the Sensitivity slider - Turn Auto Sensitivity on and then off
